sections.aboutMe: I am currently studying computer science (3rd year) at the University of Silesia in Katowice. My specialization is web development. I started my adventure in programming at the technical school in Oświęcim, where I graduated with the title of IT Technician. Since then, I have been perfecting my skills in many technologies, but I mainly specialize in creating various websites and web applications that are responsive and user-friendly.

your-movies.name: Your Movies
your-movies.description: An application for searching movies and TV shows. It allows checking information about titles and tracking cinema premieres. For example, you can watch a trailer of a given title. The data comes from the TMDB API.

money-mate.name: MoneyMate
money-mate.description: An application with role-based authorization – admin and user. It is used for managing finances. It allows adding incomes and expenses, as well as filtering and searching them.

projex-hub.name: ProjexHUB
projex-hub.description: An application with authorization that enables project management – creating, filtering, and searching. Each project can include tasks and other users.

weather-app.name: WeatherApp
weather-app.description: An interactive weather application that displays a 5-day forecast for a selected city. It includes GSAP animations and it uses the OpenWeatherMap API.

website-for-the-company.name: Company Website
website-for-the-company.description: A complete website template for a sample company with several subpages. The website was built with Bootstrap. It includes CSS animations.

games.name: Games
games.description: A website with various games, including Tic Tac Toe, Memory, Hangman, and Rock–Paper–Scissors. Each game has different modes.

to-do-list.name: To-Do List
to-do-list.description: An interactive to-do list that can be freely managed. The list is continuously saved in cookies.

mini-apps.name: Mini Apps
mini-apps.description: A website with a clock, weather forecast, and stopwatch. The site uses a simple API to fetch the current weather.
